comment.author: 89986708@N06
comment._content: P-38H "Slightly Dangerous" from 8th FG, previously assigned to 432nd FS/475th FG coded with #159 and flown by Capt. Arthur L. Peregoy.

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: Serial number 42-66750; last two digits of Lockheed construction number (1261) just visible behind the pinup's shoulder, the bird Peregoy was flying when he downed a "Zeke" on 2 November 1943.
